title.label: Very good game but more game modes!!

content.label: Ok so I’m gonna keep this short. I think this game would be really fun with more game modes. The reason I think this is because extinction is really unique and it gives you another option than just the same old game mode (not that it’s bad or anything just sayin). Multiplayer could possibly be a good one and maybe things like races where you race on a small custom map with power ups along the way. I REALLY think that this would make the game more interesting. Every time I look at one of my mobile games I look and say oh yeah I’m not really looking to playing that kind of game today, but this would give players more of an option. If you consider this I suggest you don’t make too many because then it will make people want to play those more than the original (so maybe like 2 or 3). I just really like extinction and would like to see some other things like it 😁. Overall I love this game and I think that it is one of the most OG and good games out there (by OG I mean hungry shark evo as well). It has really good graphics and just has a feel that makes it beautiful. Also just saying maybe JUST MAYBE you could make the price for the apex sharks a bit lower 👉👈 I LOVE YOUR GAME BYE!!!!!!!!!!! (Once again I said I was gonna keep it short and I failed 🤦‍♂️)

After the first time you play, whenever you hit the play button it takes you to screens to buy all sorts of crap. You head home to go back to play, and it just takes you back to the screens to buy crap. You’re caught in a loop where you can never play again, you just have all this crap they want you to buy forced on you. I gave up and deleted the app. Middle finger salute to the developers.

title.label: Corrupted Save has ruined my Game, Support is trying to help

content.label:
I have high hopes my sharks are going to be back on my TV soon. Support saw this review and has reconnected with me. Fingers crossed my sharks come back soon.

I used to love this game. I do love this game. I’d play it on my Apple TV with friends or by myself when I got home from work. It was stress relief and more for me. I have played for a long time. I recently got a message saying that my save file in the cloud was Corrupted. I lost ALL of my progress. I had an Apex Sharkjira which I grinded so hard to get and literally less than a day later all of my progress is gone... I had almost every shark completely maxed and I lost EVERYTHING. Support was initially helpful and asked that I answer a lot of questions about what I had and to give them my purchase receipts. Which I Did. I was annoyed that I had to prove my purchases happened when Ubisoft should have a record of all of my purchases but I did so anyway. I even went a step further and gave them the specific Apple receipt number on the purchases. It’s been multiple days of no silence despite my emails. I gave them everything they needed (I did have my date wrong on when I last played but it doesn’t make sense why no one is responding to me).

13321462 is my support number. Emily is the person who won’t get back with me.

11/24/2020 support has gotten back to me. Fingers crossed.

11/25/2020 support has managed to unlock a majority of my sharks. I will not be getting sharkjira back but I’ve been given my sharks so I can easily do it again. I’m so happy my game is worth playing again. I lost years of progress.
Love this game gotta try it out.so many skins and sharks that you can get and use them in events and you get diamonds to buy more sharks and skins
Ok, so this is a really awesome game and everything but when I finally got to the !! Sharks the game deleted itself and I had to start over, so it would be even better if you could fix that.

This game is the best game I’ve ever played and that is saying a lot I’ve played kingdom hearts Splatoon two but this is the best but I think you should rename JoJo sparkle because feels like you’re ripping out JoJo siwa not that I’m a fan of hers I despise her also mecha  shark in Jira why don’t you do the regular one and make Mecha a skin these are optional just suggestions by the way but enough about that let me tell you what I love about it I am a major shark fan so when I found out about this it was like my birthday and Christmas in March because I was born in February the point is I love this so much the graphics are awesome but I would love if you gave every shark a third skin that looks like the real thing because that would be awesome soAnybody who is reading this like parents who are going to download their kids this game this is perfect for them

Hey when is the big squid come back? And I was wondering if you give me something for my birthday it is on December 14 and I play this game for a loge time and I still love it is the Best game I have played.
Yes

Good game, I admit it, but there are a few problems.

Sharks: There are not enough sharks in the, “!!,” category (except for the, “XS” category). There are only 2 sharks, even there are some enemies that are like the, “!!,” category. The “!!,” category just needs like, one more shark. OR one more shark and one special that you need to buy all, “!!,” sharks.

Enemies: There are no octopuses and other kinds of sea animals that are not enemies in the Hungry Shark World, I know that there was a Giant Octopus Boss, but there was only THAT!! Quick summary, we need more enemies, kinds of enemies in fact.

ALSO...!

Reasons Why You Should Play This Game: It is fun, if you care about animals, you should still play this, cool graphics, and more, and more, and more SHARKS!!!

P.S. Add a new game mode please.
It’s a addicting fun game that wastes a lot of time.

You could get pearls by switching the mode. Try rly spectacular game

title.label: What is the point of coins?

content.label: It used to be you could grind out and save coins to get upgrades OR buy gems. Now you have to buy gems or grind out a LONG time to get anything. Get rid of coins because they serve no purpose anymore
